title: "Bridge of Spies," "Crimson Peak," "Goosebumps," "Woodlawn" Open Friday
text:
"Bridge of Spies,""Crimson Peak,""Goosebumps,""Woodlawn" Open Friday Posted just a moment ago 
Jaap Buitendijk/DreamWorks/Twentieth Century Fox (HOLLYWOOD) -- Here's a look at the new movies opening nationwide Friday: Bridge of Spies -- The Steven Spielberg-directed film stars Tom Hanks as a lawyer who is sent by the CIA to negotiate the release of a captured American U-2 pilot. Mark Rylance, Scott Shepherd, Amy Ryan, Sebastian Koch and Alan Alda also star. Rated PG-13. Crimson Peak -- Guillermo del Toro delivers a haunted house flick with an impressive cast: Mia Wasikowska, Jessica Chastain, Tom Hiddleston and Charlie Hunnam. Rated R. Goosebumps -- Jack Black plays Goosebumps author R.L. Stine, whose characters are real -- and are unintentionally released from their manuscripts onto the town. Rated PG. Woodlawn -- Amid racial tension in the 1970s, a high school football team plays a game of great significance in Alabama. Sean Astin, Nic Bishop, Caleb Castille, Sherri Shepherd and Jon Voigt star. Rated PG.
